find_package(Boost 1.71 REQUIRED)
if(Boost_FOUND)
    message(STATUS "Found Boost ${Boost_VERSION}")
    #set(Boost_USE_STATIC_LIBS ON)
endif(Boost_FOUND)

if(NOT DEFINED Boost_LIB_DIR)
    set(Boost_LIB_DIR "${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS}/../lib")
endif(NOT DEFINED Boost_LIB_DIR)
if(DEFINED Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS AND DEFINED Boost_LIB_DIR)
    add_library(BOOST INTERFACE)
    install (TARGETS BOOST DESTINATION ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/bin)
    target_link_libraries(BOOST INTERFACE ${Boost_LIBRARIES})
    target_include_directories(BOOST INTERFACE ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS})
    message(STATUS "BOOST include_dir ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS}")
endif(DEFINED Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS AND DEFINED Boost_LIB_DIR)
